200.description: Successful response. A single Book object.

req.name: id
req.description: ID of the book to delete (传入id删除对应图书)

req.name: body
req.description: Book object that needs to be updated

req.name: q
req.description: 搜索关键字（用于按标题进行关键字搜索）

req.name: count
req.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16). Default is 5.

req.name: keyword
req.description: Keyword to search in log message.

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

req.name: Authorization
req.description: Refresh token provided as a Bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: "Authorization: Bearer <refresh_token>"

req.name: Authorization
req.description: Access token using Bearer scheme. Example: "Bearer <access_token>"

200.description: 查询所有可分配的权限

req.name: body
req.description: 请求体：重置用户密码信息

req.name: uid
req.description: ID of the user to delete

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

message.example: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

400.description: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

message.example: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

req.name: body
req.description: 请求体：删除多个权限所需的参数

req.name: file
req.description: 上传的文件，multipart/form-data 中的文件字段。可重复提交同一字段以上传多个文件（request.files.getlist 支持）。
